activities: Storing medical image data and basic customer login information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: medical image data and basic customer login information, all collected on-line.
privacyprograms: U.S. HIPAA privacy program (fully compliant with the U.S. Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act).
recoursemech: TeraRecon recognizes the importance of having mechanisms in place to address and resolve complaints by Entities about the processing of Personal Information. Therefore, if an Entity makes a complaint about the processing of their information, and the complaint is not resolved to the Entity's satisfaction through internal TeraRecon procedures, then TeraRecon will refer such entity to the national data protection authority in the jurisdiction where the Entity resides as required by the Safe Harbor Program.
